ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bravery
ygData.msgSnippet: The bravest thing I have done is a Hate raid LOL! I get ported in and die is less then 5 secs. ... From: stu To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Friday,
ygData.messageBody:
The bravest thing I have done is a Hate raid LOL! I get ported in and die is less then 5 secs.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: stu
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, October 19, 2001 10:29 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bravery

Funny you should mention that - When I was setting out on the second part - from Rivervale to Freeport, some guy stopped me just before I entered Kithicor because it was 1am, he told me to wait till morning, so i did.  He he, after how far i'd come it would have been very annoying to get killed there.
 
 btw - Ralwen made it to Kelethin so say hi if you're in the neighbourhood - most peopole there don't believe that a lv6 could foot it alone from Qeynos, even with the assist through highpass, tho to be honest, with Selo's most of the zones were easy, especially once i got to the Commons.
 
Cheers
Ralwen
Bard of the 6th verse
Torvonnilous
 
Hmmm, I tend to be very cautious because I hate CRs so I don't know....  Maybe the stupidest thing I do often is running through Kithicor at any time of the night.  I just get a sow and run up on the side of the hill as fast as I can and never look back.  So far, I've been lucky and I've been doing this since my mid teen levels.  Have a friend who says I'm crazy and I should wait until day.

Lesamlam
40th Enchanter
Torvonnilous
